entry.sentence: `` Of course !
entry.parse: (ROOT (PP (`` ``) (IN Of) (NP (NN course)) (. !)))
entry.deps: root(ROOT-0, Of-2) pobj(Of-2, course-3)

entry.sentence: I will introduce you to her . ''
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB introduce) (NP (PRP you)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP her))))) (. .) ('' '')))
